### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected by a pipe.
- Make sure that the pipe is not blocked by other entities.
- Verify that the fluid system is correctly set up and that the pipe is part of the correct fluid system.

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure that the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Make sure that the chest is not full and that the inserter has a clear path to the chest.
- Verify that the inserter is correctly configured and that the items are being picked up and dropped correctly.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the tile is empty and that there are no other entities blocking the placement.
- Make sure that the entity is being placed in a valid location and that it is not overlapping with other entities.
- Verify that the entity is correctly configured and that all necessary dependencies are met.
